item.title: Sex offenders.. On Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Can’t resist…

Anyway, as for all the Gold4rs bullshit, they aren’t getting shut down…They are just renaming it to “Gold4fun.” Jagex was able to hijack the domain on a mere technicality of Gold4rs being “identical or confusingly similar” to runescape.com. They aren’t going to be able to do that a second time, so really, Gold4rs isn’t going anywhere.

@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:3, topic:413304”]In other news, Jagex just hijacked www.gold4rs.com.[/quote]Woooooot!

I love their explanation too: “Jagex is clearly only doing this for the money”, when in fact Gold4RS is the one doing it for more money, and Jagex makes no extra money if it’s a worker paying for the game instead of an actual player XD And I’m sure all the ‘parents’ they interviewed saying their children were ‘glued to the computer’ didn’t realize that a lot of kids will use their parents money without their permission to pay for this sort of game stuff.
